name: Scratch Pizzeria
description:
Welcome to Scratch's Pizzeria!

Here we serve young and all PIZZA and 

torture kids to listen to our songs and then kill them.

We all care about each and everyone's safety in the official SCRATCH'S PIZZERIA! - Scratch Cat

We also hired a security guy or dude WHATEVER to watch our property at all times. The dude will be rescued at 6:AM by a political police department. - Tera

-NIGHT 1- So uhh you have a light right? RIGHT. So uhh when an animatronic comes in your office, CLOSE THE LIGHT OR GET STUFFED IN A SUIT. Ok anyways bye see ya the next night.

-NIGHT 2- Yeah ummm, its very hard to see if Nano is in the vents soooo um just keep on closing the door lock by pressssing "D" in the vents. Nano is very quick soo good luck getting two things done properly. (You will hear vent noises to help you!) Also, you can close the vent door without having to open the cams! But, If you are on another server other than the vents, it will not work!

-NIGHT 3- Yeah things get more harder, have you ever heard of Giga SHE IS DANG FAST BRUTHA. So uhhh keep a close eye out on her.

-NIGHT 4- Can we just say for the fact your doomed..

-NIGHT 5- Well uhh.... Oh no.. OH NO. OHHH NO-

WARNING- DO NOT LEAVE THIS SITE OR YOUR CHANGES WILL NOT SAVE.. ALSO THIS GAME IS HARD.. VERY HARD.

NEW-

You can now press S to view the cameras.

I took away the power thing.. it's too hard to handle..

You can also press space to close the lights

Now you can use numbers to view which camera you want to see Exp: I press 1 to go to show stage because the number/code for show stage is 1.

There is a secret.... Only if you are lucky, you can get it. Beat the game and get the SECRET ending...... good luck!

Added new "extras" menu. Now you can experience jumpscares before you play! Or you can experience it for yourself. 

Updated cameras, added effects. Updated static.

Added phone calls! Press "m" to mute the call at any time!s
